meanings.definition: The state or quality of being foamy.
meanings.sent1: The foaminesses of the ocean waves made them look fluffy.
meanings.sent2: I love the foaminesses of a freshly poured root beer float.
meanings.sent3: The foaminesses of the bubble bath made it seem like a magical potion.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement had a foaminesses that bubbled over and filled the room.
meanings.sent5: The foaminesses of the cappuccino was so thick, it almost felt like drinking a cloud.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a frothy or bubbly appearance.
meanings.sent1: The foaminesses of the milkshake made it extra delicious.
meanings.sent2: The foaminesses of the soap made washing hands fun for kids.
meanings.sent3: The foaminesses of the soda tickled my nose as I took a sip.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter had a foaminesses that lifted everyone's spirits.
meanings.sent5: The foaminesses of the hot chocolate was like a warm hug on a cold day.
